column1: Smoque BBQ////If you like pulled pork
column2: it's a must try. It melts in your mouth tender
column3: and the flavor is amazing. You get a couple different bbq sauces
column4: I enjoy both very much. The Carolina style goes great poured on the pork and I actually like dipping my sandwich and fries in the Memphis (can't get enough bbq) I love the brisket as well
